name: H O R S (?)
description:
After finally beating your arch-rival from shop class, you find yourself stuck in a strange void, only able to find refuge by taking a job at a local bistro. Roast some beans, embrace the vibes, bond with your coworkers, and see where things go.

This horse experience is a direct continuation of H O R S _. It's highly recommended that you play that horse experience first.
